cd repo
gobin -m -p github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module
stdout ^$WORK/repo/.gobincache/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/@v/v1.0.0/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/non-module'$'
! stderr .+

exec $WORK/repo/.gobincache/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/@v/v1.0.0/github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module/non-module
stdout '^I am not a module$'
! stderr .+

-- repo/go.mod --
module example.com/repo

require github.com/gobin-testrepos/non-module v1.0.0
